### isTruncatingStore() {#aa749a22473eb96b69739110332910e4e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::StoreSDNode::isTruncatingStore () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if the op does a truncation before store.

For integers this is the same as doing a TRUNCATE and storing the result. For floats, it is the same as doing an FP&#95;ROUND and storing the result.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02508">2508</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
